name: ERASE - I wanted to make a game, but I preferred to be honest
name_original: ERASE - I wanted to make a game, but I preferred to be honest
description:
ERASE - I wanted to make a game, but I preferred to be honest is a RPG-platformer game developed by Saijo DS. It came out on 01-06-2020.
ERASE - I wanted to make a game, but I preferred to be honest is available on PC, macOS and Linux. The game is sold via itch.io.
